description: This is a Dart source file defining the LoginScreen widget for a Flutter app. It implements a login form with email and password fields, validation, error handling, and navigation to a registration screen.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen UI.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the login form, validation, and submission logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingControllers used in the form.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation, login request, and UI updates upon submission.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the login screen, including form fields and buttons.
